dao.name: CHK_HOTEL_SVAL_MN_IS_EXIST_ORDER_MN
dao.statement: select count(*) as hotel_sval_mn_count from hotel_sval_mn where athena_id = ? and sys_cod = 'HFD' and val_rmk = 'ghist_mn_guest_typ' and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_HOTEL_SVAL_MN_IS_CNTRY_RF_DEL
dao.statement: Select hotel_cod from hotel_sval_mn Where athena_id =:athena_id and sys_cod='HFD' AND trim(VAL_RMK)= 'contry_cod' and val_nam = rpad(:contry_cod,120) and rownum =1
